duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the overall general ledger and reporting functions in the accounting group.
Ensure quality and accuracy of financial information for internal and external financial reporting.
Maximize the utilization of the Company's accounting and financial reporting systems.
Drive the effectiveness of international accounting and global corporate financial consolidation.
Responsible for ensuring adherence to Company policies related to accounting, transactional processing, and financial reporting.
Lead the recognition of capitalized assets, compliance with applicable U.S. GAAP, and property tax reporting.
Ensure accuracy and adequacy of recognized liabilities, including accounts payable, accrued expenses, debt, and others.
Ensure revenue recognition in accordance with ASC606 and manage audits with external and internal parties.
Manage the payroll team and review payroll pay register, stock transactions, and monthly commission payments.
Lead accounts payable team, ensure accuracy of payments, improve and automate AP processes, and maintain company policies.
Ensure employees are paid accurately and tax wage reporting is appropriate.

education_certification.credential: CPA required, preferably with public accounting experience. Bachelor's degree required, MBA a plus.
